item.title: Kristi Noem Slams ‘South Park’ Portrayal: “So Lazy to Make Fun of Women for How They Look”
item.description: The Homeland boss responds to that brutal episode: “Only the liberals and the extremists do that.”

item.title: As White House talks about impounding NASA funding, Congress takes the threat seriously
item.description: “NASA appears to be acting in accordance with a fringe, extremist ideology.”
